content:
ICS 280, Computer Law Seminar

Winter 1996 --- David G. Kay

This course meets Tuesdays and Thursdays, 9:30 to 10:50, in room 360D Computer Science. All interested graduate students (and senior undergrads) are welcome.

The readings for the course come from a range of sources, many of which are available on the Web.

David G. Kay, 408E Computer Science
Department of Information and Computer Science, University of California, Irvine
Irvine, CA 92697-3425. (714) 824-5072 --- Fax (714) 824-4056 --- Email kay@uci.edu
